data.name: Mabel for Boobs 'em up
data.detailed_description:
Mabel is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born overseas, but raised in the London, United Kingdom. The youngest of 4 siblings, Mabel has always had a dominant, confident nature.

When she was in high school, she was really that tease and style girl. It was all fetishes that developed along the way. So in high school, Mabel liked to work up the boys and get them nice and hard. She really loved playing with people’s minds and their heads and it was really erotic for her.

When Mabel met her husband, he really enjoyed strap-on play so they always played with that. Orgasm control and just talking and teasing each other. Different types of bondage… they just really enjoyed exploring.

Mabel first started working in the adult entertainment industry as an exotic dancer in strip clubs. Although she enjoyed working as an exotic dancer, Mabel ended up taking a corporate job in 2008 when the economy declined. In this manner Mabel started working as a recruiter. Although she thrived in this recruitment position for 4 years, Mabel soon understood the job to be incredibly draining and she longed to return to a more creative role. She decided to try herself as a prostitute!

Help Mabel to take her place on the street!

data.short_description: Mabel is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 1.2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
